name: Past Midnight - 1-4-24 iOS Turn based Game -Take 2 -Requote
blurb: I am bringing a timeless bar dice game into the digital world on iOS. The game needs one last "kick" to make my dream a reality.

rewards.reward: Its a buck - CMON. You will get the premium non ad version of the app (value 1.99) for half price!! Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

You Got 5 on it! You win a free promo code for the, FULL version of the game, once it hits the App Store. Plus you will get a free $9.99 worth of in app credits! ($11.98 value) Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

You're a perfect 10! You win a free promo code for the, FULL version of the game, once it hits the App Store. Plus you will get a free $19.99 worth of in app credits! ($21.98 value) Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

Thats like a quarter x 100. Less than a sixer of the really good beer. The free promo code for the, FULL version of the game, once it hits the App Store. Plus you will get a free $49.99 worth of in app credits! ($51.98 value) Stay thirsty my friends. Also I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

Nooo waay! The app plus $49.99 IAP + you get all the table artwork upgrades for free. Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share. This is way better than part of a BS date. You know it.

HARD CORE GAMER - Skip all the junk - just BETA test as well as get a free promo copy. I mean the only thing I am missing is the year supply of Mountain Dew. Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

COWABUNGA BRO. Get an official 1-4-24 Leather Dice Cup not only do you get the app plus $49.99 of IAP (minus the beta tester), but you will be included in the game credits. You can show your grand kids that you made a game. Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share. Way better than a keg.

THANKS x 250! - You get the app, the IAP, the Dice cup set, name in credits and a limited edition official 1-4-24 Dice Game Hoodie! So Stylin. Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

Daring designer package! You get all of the above, AND you\u2019ll get to work with us in designing the look of a new table and shaker cup. Awesome! You\u2019ll get the chance to work directly with our development team, so that we can create an exclusive look for your In-App purchase package, which will have YOUR name on it in the game. AND, you\u2019ll be featured as part of the designer team on the game credits! Plus I will add another brand new premium app (.99 value) - Instasave - Instagram browser with save and share.

Truly be immortalized! Incredible! Your name, company name, or someone's name will have its own place at the table as Player 3 and Player 4. Can you find a better place for advertisement than the next-best-thing on the App Store? Don\u2019t think so! Plus, all of the rewards above! And get a copy of my apps for life!

We love you too! Seriously! We will put you up in a hotel in sf and take you for a dinner at House of Prime Rib, then go to Black Horse and play some 1-4-24 while drinking libations and chatting for the rest of the night. Plus everything above expect getting your name as a player. And get a copy of my apps for life!
